title: Vampyre: A Bedside Companion
description: "Here is a comprehensive anthology of vampire stories, all dating from the most creative period in the development of the Vampire Count and the Fatal Woman as figures in European fantasy literature--between Lord Byron and Bram Stoker. Many of the stories and selections in The Vampyre have never been published before, and the collection includes material that has been newly translated into English".
author: Christopher Frayling
